item.title: Making it pk everywhere
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

  1. Search for
Public Boolean NonWild

Should look like this

public boolean nonWild() {

if((absX >= 2605 && absX <= 3138 && absY >= 2620 && absY <=3153 ) || (absX >= 3143 && absX <= 3653 && absY >=3186 && absY <=3690 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

All those coords are adding safe zones so just delete them.

EDIT: Hold on, iâ€™ll try and code it real quick[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 11:41:31 AM[/size][hr]Try this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3431 && absY >= 3257 && absY <=3439 ) || (absX >= 3258 && absX <= 3434 && absY >=3260 && absY <=3437 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
